item.title: Plums
item.description: Four plums on my table Dark red and ripe. Sweet and juicy. I also have chocolate cream biscuits In the shelf The sun will rise soon and

item.title: Ode to the Apple
item.description: Oh, Symbol of material Love, The ‘Apple’ of my eye, Your cold, mountain fragrance, Red beauty, Temptation, By you, we were separated from Eden. Peaceful, wholesome, godly Eden.
